title: Mark Boals - Really The Best (2-CD) 2015 320ak
description:
Mark Boals - Really The Best (2-CD) 2015 320ak

Mark Robert Boals (born December 5, 1958) is an American heavy metal vocalist, best known for his work with Yngwie Malmsteen. As a young child he learned to play the piano and bass guitar. 
Although Boals has never had any vocal lessons or training, as a teenager he gained experience as a vocalist in local groups. Boals is the founder and vocalist for the band Ring of Fire, and as of 2014, he is also the bassist for Dokken. And this guy has a long history in the Hard Rock/Metal genre. Far more than I have room for here.

So here is a link to his site...
